Package org.apache.sling.discovery.base.connectors.ping

Class TopologyConnectorClient

java.lang.Object
org.apache.sling.discovery.base.connectors.ping.TopologyConnectorClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
TopologyConnectorClientInformation
public class TopologyConnectorClient extends Object implements TopologyConnectorClientInformation
A topology connector client is used for sending (pinging) a remote topology connector servlet and exchanging announcements with it
